title: We nedd change - desperately need change
text:
I agree that education should be free for all and I am all for the student protesting but I don't agree with the violence which ALWAYS accompanies a protest.
 I also do not believe that the protesting crowds that were pictured on ENCA et al were necessarily students but persons unknown who needed an escape from their frustrations as well.
It is not only Students who are being let down - what about the children who learn (on their way to university?) under trees or down pit toilets because the Government has done nothing, but nothing for education except throw good money after bad.
No new schools for the kids, unskilled teachers 30% to pass a matric and that gets you ready for 'Varsity? Man, they have to start from the bottom - Grade R - never mind about introducing Mandarin - concentrate on what is the basic requirement for life after school the three R's reading writing and arithmetic.
So it was and so it ever shall be. I don't agree with the violence though - come on guys pull yourselves together and show the world that you are mature enough to study and get that degree and then our country will be strong, Right now it is no better than during apartheid. The rich getting richer and the poor getting poorer! And Zuma with his Std 3 education wouldn't sit down with you guys - enough said.
